nodes.label: X教授
nodes.info: Professor Charles Xavier (colloquial: Professor X) is a fictional character appearing in American comic books published by Marvel Comics. The character is depicted as the founder and sometimes leader of the X-Men. Created by writer Stan Lee and artist Jack Kirby, the character first appeared in The X-Men #1 (September 1963).

nodes.label: 金刚狼
nodes.info: Wolverine (born James "Jimmy" Howlett), also known as Logan, was a mutant born with retractable forearm claws, enhanced physical parameters, and a powerful healing factor. The co-leader of the X-Men, he was also a famous hero and warrior being a veteran of multiple wars.

nodes.label: 广播
nodes.info: 各作品通用广播/播音员。
